sentences.english: Abundant kidney-yin nourishes the organs in the body.
sentences.chinese: 肾阴足，肌体各脏腑组织器官得到滋养。

sentences.english: Abundant kidney-yang warms and promotes all the viscera and organs.
sentences.chinese: 肾阳足，肌体各脏腑组织器官得以温平和推动。

sentences.english: Qi and blood in the body are the material basis for the physiological activities of the zang-fu and meridians.
sentences.chinese: 人体气血是脏腑经络生理活动的物质基础。

sentences.english: He is to wash the inner parts and the legs with water, and the priest is to bring all of it and burn it on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 但脏腑与腿要用水洗，祭司就要全然奉献烧在坛上。

sentences.english: He washed the inner parts and the legs and burned them on top of the burnt offering on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 又洗了脏腑和腿，烧在坛上的燔祭上。

sentences.english: The fire of Kidney Yang is the original force supporting other organs' physiological activities.
sentences.chinese: 肾阳相火是其他脏腑生理活动的原动力。

sentences.english: Zang-organ and fu-organ, are kinds of special names called in TCM.
sentences.chinese: 脏腑是中医概念中特有的有差别的器官称谓。

sentences.english: From the perspective of traditional Chinese medicine beauty, viscera is the source of skins deep nourishment.
sentences.chinese: 从中医美容的角度理解，脏腑是皮肤深层滋养的源头。

sentences.english: Clinical general the stroke divides into the internal organs and the channels and collaterals, but dialectical treats.
sentences.chinese: 临床上将中风分为中脏腑和中经络而辨证施治。

sentences.english: He is to wash the inner parts and the legs with water, and the priest is to burn all of it on the altar.
sentences.chinese: 但燔祭的脏腑与腿，要用水洗。

sentences.english: Every viscera and all parts of body are all something but nothing.
sentences.chinese: 各个脏腑，身体各个部分，也都是若有若无的。

sentences.english: Asking about locality of the pain helps understand pathological changes of internal organs and meridians;
sentences.chinese: 问疼痛的部位可以帮助了解脏腑经络的病理改变。

sentences.english: In the treatment, nourishing the liver-Qi and regulating organs can be achieved positive results.
sentences.chinese: 在治疗上重视补肝气，调理脏腑，可取得成效。

sentences.english: In different parts of the face belongs to different viscera and meridians.
sentences.chinese: 在面部的不同部位分属于不同的脏腑和经络。

sentences.english: Heat cellulites viscera when Chilliness with fever, mouth thirst, depressed.
sentences.chinese: 热毒内陷脏腑时伴恶寒发热，口干渴，烦闷。

sentences.english: Explore the characteristic of the pathological viscera.
sentences.chinese: 探讨冠心病的病变脏腑特点。

definition: five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
pathogeny (cause of disease) in TCM/as opposed to vital energy 正氣|正气[zheng4 qi4]
bodily fluids (general term in Chinese medicine)
interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
